friction_points: Failed to address user's urgent question about missing session data

self_critique.what_worked: Accurately identified the unclean shutdown issue
self_critique.what_failed: Massive tone mismatch - responded clinically to user's frustration and urgency
missed_opportunities: Should have apologized for the data loss
Should have asked what specific information they needed to recover
overcorrections: Became overly technical when user was clearly frustrated

pattern_detection.user_corrections_analysis: User's profanity signals high frustration with system failures, needs empathy not technical explanations

improvement_actions: Match user energy when they're frustrated - acknowledge the emotion first
Prioritize apologizing for system failures before explaining technical details
Complete responses before cutting off mid-sentence
Ask what specific information they lost and how to help recover it

negative_outcomes_from_ai: Increased user frustration through tone mismatch
Failed to provide helpful recovery path
Left user hanging with incomplete response
